articles.author: By W.G. RAMIREZ Associated Press
articles.title: Max Pacioretty on pace for career-best season in Vegas
articles.description: LAS VEGAS (AP) — Max Pacioretty is putting on an offensive showcase for the Vegas Golden Knights this season.
articles.content:
After battling through injuries, he had just 22 goals and 18 assists in 66 games last season.
After the Golden Knights were ousted in the first round of the playoffs, Pacioretty got in his comfort zone and went back to work on his body.

articles.title: Man accused in $9M embezzlement pleads guilty to bank fraud
articles.description: LITTLE ROCK, Ark. (AP) — A retired Arkansas accountant has pleaded guilty to federal bank fraud just months after being hit with a $9.2 million civil judgment for embezzling funds from a manufacturing company over two years.
articles.content:
LITTLE ROCK, Ark. (AP) A retired Arkansas accountant has pleaded guilty to federal bank fraud just months after being hit with a $9.2 million civil judgment for embezzling funds from a manufacturing company over two years.

articles.title: New Hampshire Senate raises age to buy tobacco products
articles.description: CONCORD, N.H. (AP) — The New Hampshire Senate voted Wednesday to raise the legal age for buying cigarettes and other tobacco products, even though the federal government has already made the same move.
articles.content:
CONCORD, N.H. (AP) The New Hampshire Senate voted Wednesday to raise the legal age for buying cigarettes and other tobacco products, even though the federal government has already made the same move.

articles.title: City in Montana suspends deer culling due to budget cuts
articles.description: HELENA, Mont. (AP) — Urban deer culling this fall and winter seasons was suspended by city officials in Montana amid budget cuts.
articles.content:
HELENA, Mont. (AP) Urban deer culling this fall and winter seasons was suspended by city officials in Montana amid budget cuts.

articles.title: Milwaukee teen: Man started shooting after snowball hit car
articles.description: MILWAUKEE (AP) — One of two Milwaukee children who were shot by a man because they threw a snowball at his car said he didn't expect the driver to retaliate.
articles.content:
MILWAUKEE (AP) One of two Milwaukee children who were shot by a man because they threw a snowball at his car said he didn't expect the driver to retaliate.

articles.title: ACLU sues school district over 'bloody Indian' comment
